Name: Colletti Royale
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Wine glass .
Prepare garnish of dehydrated blood orange wheel.
Review: Sweet and sour and very fruity - like a good Valentine's date.
History: Adapted from a Valentine's drink created in 2013 by Julie Reiner in New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Colletti Royale contains 201 calories
